S.FORM: badidiw u mitulikay tu badidiw ku kawaw ni ina. siwkay nu badidiw badidiw sa, namasanga' nu wuway. pasaksak i lala' , taneng mueneng taneng mabi. inuayawan, mabi ku tademaw i tatakel. u tatakel sa mahiza tu badidiw, nasangaan nu wuway saca auk. badidw saepi' i lalud mabi'. ayzasa, inayi' ku singing matineng misanga' tu mahiniay. unucakayay amin. tinaku nu kamu misabadidiw misabadidiw misabadidiw ci Tubah pipawalian tu tipus. pabadidiwan pabadidiwan i pabadidiwan pawali ku nilangecan. sibadidiw sibadidiw sibadidiw ku paylumaluma' nu malukay. sibadidiway sibadidiway nayay tu ku sibadidiway nu malukay ayza. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika . , . A mat is a piece of fabric material that generally is placed on a floor or other flat surface. Mats serve a range of purposes including: namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
